task.title: User Detail - General
task.shortdesc: This screen shows you the general details for am IAM user. From this page, you can change a user name, disable a user, delete a user, or modify a user's quotas and credentials.

task.title: General tab
task.shortdesc: This tab lets you rename a user, add a user to groups, and add a policy for the user.

step.cmd: Type the name into the Name text field.

task.title: Add a user to a group

taskbody.context: To add a user to a group:

step.cmd: Select the group from the Select a group... drop-down list box.
Click the Add User to Group button.

task.title: Remove the user from a group

taskbody.context: To remove the user from a group:

step.cmd: Click on the gear icon to the right of the group name in the groups list. A context menu will appear.
Select Remove user from the context menu.

task.title: Actions menu
task.shortdesc: Clicking the Actions button brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected image.

taskbody.context: The following context menu actions are available:

step.cmd: This item deletes a user's password and creates an IAM access "deny all actions" policy that prevents them from executing any actions against the cloud. The user's other information, including active access keys, is maintained until you either make the user active again or delete them.
This item allows you to delete a volume.

info.note: This menu item deletes a user and all keys, passwords and permissions associated with that user..
